alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 16 at 2:22AM EST until December 17 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of the Big Bend of Florida, including the following areas, Coastal Jefferson, Coastal Taylor, Inland Jefferson, Inland Taylor, Lafayette and Madison and south central Georgia, including the following areas, Berrien, Brooks, Colquitt, Cook, Lanier, Lowndes and Thomas. * WHEN...From this evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Rainfall totals of 2 to 4 inches with locally higher amounts are expected through Sunday morning. With the ground saturated from previous rainfall, flooding is possible. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
